snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 - Blood Soaked Snake-Hands
snippet.description:
Christie is a cold-blooded assassin and a master of the art of Shequan (Snake Fist). Former associate and a rival of Bayman. She was placed in charge of arranging the assassination of Fame Douglas by Victor Donovan, and also monitored Helena's movements for him under the guise of working as her attendant. Currently she works for M.I.S.T. as Donovan's loyal servant, and her true relation to Rig is still covered in mystery..

[NEW STAGE] 
The Road Rage Arena has several dangers on the highway that can be devastating to your opponents.  Flammable vehicles and trucks that are on the verge of falling down can also be used during the intense fights.

Pre-orders across all systems are now underway. For the latest pre-order information, including a description of all pre-order and early purchase bonuses, please visit our official website at https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/products.html 

Follow us here:
[official facebook] https://facebook.com/Deadoralivegame
[official twitter] https://twitter.com/DOATEC_OFFICIAL
[official twitch] https://twitch.tv/Deadoralivegame
#DEADORALIVE6 #DOA6 #Christie
